.. _iesr:

Impact of Events Scale – Revised (IES-R)
----------------------------------------

.. include:: include_data_collection_plus_local_upgrade.rst

Original references:

- Horowitz M, Wilner N, Alvarez W (1979). Impact of Event Scale: a measure of
  subjective stress. *Psychosom Med.* 1979 May;41(3):209-18. PMID
  https://www.pubmed.gov/472086.

- Weiss DS, Marmar CR. The impact of event scale – revised. In: Wilson JP,
  Keane TM, editors. *Assessing psychological trauma and PTSD.* New York:
  Guilford Press; 1997. pp. 399–411.

- Weiss DS (2007). The Impact of Event Scale – Revised. In Wilson JP, Keane TM
  (eds). *Assessing psychological trauma and PTSD: a practitioner's handbook*
  (2nd ed., pp. 168-189). New York: Guilford Press. [Includes scale.]
